name: A Rex Rampage With 3D - Dangerous Dinosaurs Walking & Run-ning to Destroy & Devour Everything!
name_original: A Rex Rampage With 3D - Dangerous Dinosaurs Walking & Run-ning to Destroy & Devour Everything!
description:
SMASH, CRASH & BLOW STUFF UP!

Genetically engineered and on the loose!

You are Trex king of the dinosaurs, hell
bent on a destruction rampage!

Don’t let the human capture you!

> SMASH, run and jump stuff to survive, don’t get captured
> AVOID bear traps, spikes, bombs and missiles
> DESTROY fences, fallen trees and wooden toilets! lol
> EAT humans and collect awesome power ups

FEATURES:

> Single or Real Time Multiplayer!
> Thrilling endless gameplay
> Amazing 3D graphics
> Free daily awards
> Three Trex characters
> Easy, intuitive controls
> Loads of achievements to unlock
> Plenty of upgrades
> Epic soundtrack

Download NOW 100% FREE!
